articles.title: UK's Eurovision entry revealed ahead of socially-distanced Rotterdam show - Mirror Online
articles.description: The UK has selected singer James Newman - brother of chart-topper John Newman - for 2021's Eurovision song contest after 2020's show was cancelled amid the pandemic
articles.content:
